announcements.title: Title 1
announcements.subtitle: Hope your booking with the new Client of yours goes well.  If you think it does, remind your customer that they can add you as their Top Pro.  This makes it so that you get first dibs to claim their future jobs.

announcements.title: Title 2
announcements.subtitle: The Handy platform works hard to serve customers and professionals. If you work with a customer off the platform that you found through Handy, you will be assessed a $100 fee.
